TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, you are sucked into the engine of a plane which falls down and kills 5000 people

i wish my IQ was increased by 100 points(no i did not start with like a 10 or below 100)

Granted. You are incredibly dumb, because IQ cannot actually accurately measure the intelligence of an individual.

I wish giant frogs roamed the earth and ate cars.

granted. Except they also eat people. one person in particular. What does the inside of a frog look like, tery215?

i wish i wasn't so full so i could finish my cookie.

Granted. Your cookie isn't so full either, you don't gain any satisfaction from eating it.

I wish a horrible nightmare creature exploded on the moon, sending moon-chunks crashing into the earth and disrupting the tide significantly. (Thanks to Kirby. ._.)

Granted. I'm at least 3% sure that wish corrupted itself.

I wish to be the 1 percent.

Granted. You are the 1 percent of people that aren't in the original 1 percent.

I wish for energy levels over.......8999.

Granted...ish. Your wish to finish fishing requires you to obtain Finnish fish. Luckily the Finns help finish your fishy wish.

I wish to unhear Rebecca Black's "Friday."

Granted. You now have to listen to justin beiber's song 'Baby' 24/7

I wish I had a tortoise.

Granted, it escapes and tries to cross a road... You fill in the gaps.

I wish Raedwulf would upload Turbo Dismount more often.

Granted, but he uploads so much Turbo Dismount that he stops uploading anything else.

I wish PewDiePie would upload more Turbo Dismount.

Granted. It's a PewDiePie video.

I wish for KEEEEEEEEEEVVVVVVVVIIIIIIIIIINNNNNN

Granted. You say LEEEERROOOOOYYYY JEEENNNKKIIIINNNNSSSS. Kevin's name is Leroy Jenkins.

I wish for no negative consequences.

Granted. You get what someone else considers a positive consequence, an asteroid destroying your hometown.

Exactly.e

Grnanted...argleblwrglevlahgr.

I wish for SPAAAAAAACE

Granted. A giant void rips the earth in two, also causing severe damage in half.

I wish square root my thinking capabilities on a scale generally similar to an IQ scale to the power of three inside my head.

Granted. Square rooting to the power of three makes I to the first power, which is I. Your intelligence is the same.

I wish for antimatter on your lawn.

granted, since you never specified the lawn, (about a gram of) antimatter appears on lawns worldwide which results in the destruction of civilization

i wish that i can learn how to use and understand all forms of computer codes such as Java and C++ in existence

Granted, but you are bound by a non-disclosure agreement that prevents you from using it in any way, shape, or form.

I wish there was a comprehensive tutorial for UV Mapping.

Granted. However, it is about mapping using the ultraviolet wavelength, which results in a generally fuzzy map of Earth's atmosphere.

I wish the sun was a T9 Class Star!

Granted. Unfortunately, I misread your wish, and replaced the Sun with a TI-82.

I wish for a never-ending storyyyyyyyyyyy (na na na)

Granted, but since Falkor likes children... Yea

I wish for the above not to be taken offensively

Nobody knows what you mean.

Your face is blue. This is non-revokable.

No wish, so yea...

I wish for people to actually wish something

Ok, but they wish for nuclear war.

I wish for PHENOMINAL COSMIC POWER
